CustomField.description: Mark an in progress survey response as completed after this number of days since the last response update.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the number of days since the last update to a participant's survey response after which the response will be automatically marked as completed. This feature ensures that in-progress survey responses are automatically completed if no updates are made within the specified timeframe. To enable this functionality, activate the scheduled job "SurveyCompletionSchedulable".
CustomField.label: Auto Complete In-Progress Responses
